value.title: Austin Power BI User Group - Charticulator 101
value.excerpt: This Austin User Group presentation is all about the Basics of Charticulator. We also go through three demos of visual creations. 1. Build a fancy Bar chart mirroring what is done in desktop 2. Cool chart with stacked bars and scatter plot 3. Box and Whisker chart  Follow Mike on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelcarlo/

value.title: Charticulator Custom Visuals (with Daniel Marsh-Patrick)
value.excerpt: Come hang out as Daniel Marsh-Patrick shows us to use the amazing charticular web browser tool to make custom visuals to use in Power BI reports! value.title: Create Slope Chart (KPI) using Charticulator and using in Power BI
value.excerpt: This another my investigation on creating a custom visual using Charticulator. I created a Slope Chart that can be used as a KPI visual to measure the trend of a specific group in two different scales. IN this example, I have a simple data set with student Name, their score in 2015 and 2014 and another

value.title: How to build custom visuals without code with Power BI | Community Webinar
value.excerpt: In this webinar, learn how to create custom visuals without writing code using a project that originated from Microsoft's own Charticulator. Go through multiple examples of building custom visuals to understand how this tool can fill specific reporting needs.   Learn more: https://community.powerbi.com

value.title: PowerBI Tips Introducing Custom Visuals Gallery
value.excerpt: It's 2019 and a good time for another great tool for Power BI.  I'm proud to announce the release of the Custom Visuals Gallery and Charts Building tool.    Gallery (Download Free Visualization Files) http://gallery.powerbi.tips  Charts (Free no code solution to building visualizations) http://charts.powerbi.tips
